extendedInfo.description: LeagueDroid, everything you need for League Of legends!LeagueDroid is designed to be the complete solution for browser LoL champion's and builds. You can do everything from looking at your favorite championâs base damage to search for advance builds and help. You want to know what items you should buy or what masteries to choose? This app is perfect for you!Features: â¢ EloDroidâ¢ Jungle Timer!â¢ Real time search function for Champions and Items.â¢ Server Status Check functionâ¢ Browser items and champions offline.â¢ Show builds from mobafire and Solomid, with items, masteries, runes and abilityâs.â¢ Show you if the build your reading is popular or not. â¢ Show information about runes, items, masteries, abilityâs and champions.â¢ Background synchronization â¢ Counter pickâ¢ Multi Build Support!â¢ Ability to mark builds as favorites! And much more!Tags: League of Legends, lol , mobafire, build , lol build, League Droid, league , legends, LoL, help, lol help,lol timer,league of legend, league of legends build,jungle timer,mobadroid, league of legends timer, league of legends jungle timer, lol jungle timer,solomid,LegueDroid, League Droid, lol for android, League of Legends for android, Builds and guides, lol guides, lol builds,best league of legends app

reviews.title: No notes, partial guide support.
reviews.comment: I feel as though the notes and guide support is very lacking. Half the time there\'s just a list of items, then there\'s the rare time when there\'s a list of items, and some of what the writer Put for build notes.  There\'s not much for us to look at other than items. There\'s way more information other than stats, item build and skill order that we need to see.
reviews.author: quentin smith

reviews.title: Clean and smooth.
reviews.comment: Great app all around. Best builds for all toons, server status, and let\'s you  know which toons are free for the week. Clean and works  great. Lately images for items are broken and build notes not showing up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: It crashes everytime I try to open a build guide.  Worked fine before last patch.  Please fix that
reviews.author: Ej Varsovia

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Used to crash everytime i opened a build guide now it just Crashes on startup
reviews.author: Timothy Jetten

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Gives me cointer picks and builds when trying a new champ
reviews.author: Zachary Staten

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Cody Goodman

reviews.title: Easy to use app!
reviews.comment: The best LoL app out there imo. Easy to use with lots of options.
reviews.author: Keystone25210

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Could be better if you could have more than 4counter picks
reviews.author: Marcin Wronski

reviews.title: Nice but some things wont load.
reviews.comment: Most of the item pictures load but not all of them and some of the build guides don\'t load fully but overall its not to bad and gives new players like myself ideas were too start off at.
reviews.author: Jimi Smith

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Leaguedroid has all u need for LoL! I love it!
reviews.author: Ross Gibson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Clean UI. Works flawlessly. Great app for the newbies
reviews.author: Raph A.

reviews.title: Nice but..
reviews.comment: Guides are nice but the item pics do not load.
reviews.author: Lizzy Mallory

reviews.title: Won\'t show pictures of items
reviews.comment: The item pictures in all your mobafire guides won\'t show

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Have had no problem with this app on Samsung stratosphere

reviews.title: Great app

reviews.title: Still force closing
reviews.comment: Loved this app until it stop working
reviews.author: Donald Russell

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: casey mckenzie

reviews.title: Fixed
reviews.comment: Finally fixed the issue back to being the app I use the most.
reviews.author: John Serwatka

reviews.title: Nice layout can\'t access builds
reviews.comment: Much like some other comments, the build area seems to be broken and crashes on any attempt to load a build. Outside of that, though, this is a really nice app that seems to have a lot of information. It would be a five star if they fixed the build-crash bug.
reviews.author: Zac Doscher

reviews.title: great but needs to be fixed, otherwise useless
reviews.comment: It would be perfect if it did not crash every time you tried to access the builds. Sometimes the hud is messed up on the home screen and it has search bar under all of the options that you would use to look at things for. It\'s great besides that and I\'ll give it 5 stars if it fixes.
reviews.author: Jasmine Perkins
